Package com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.service.appointment

Interface IAppointmentService

All Known Implementing Classes:
AppointmentService
public interface IAppointmentService
Service interface for managing appointments. Provides methods to create, update, delete, and retrieve appointment-related data.

  • Method Details

    • createAppointment

      Appointment createAppointment(BookAppointmentRequest request, Long sender, Long recipient)
      Creates a new appointment and associates it with the sender (patient) and recipient (veterinarian).
      Parameters:
      request - the appointment details and associated pets.
      sender - the ID of the patient creating the appointment.
      recipient - the ID of the veterinarian receiving the appointment.
      Returns:
      the created Appointment.

    • updateAppointment

      AppointmentDto updateAppointment(Long id, AppointmentUpdateRequest request)
      Updates an existing appointment with new details.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the appointment to update.
      request - the updated details of the appointment.
      Returns:
      the updated Appointment.

    • addPetForAppointment

      AppointmentDto addPetForAppointment(Long id, Pet pet)
      Adds a new pet to an existing appointment.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the appointment.
      pet - the pet to be added to the appointment.
      Returns:
      the updated Appointment.

    • getAllAppointments

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<AppointmentDto> getAllAppointments(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves a paginated list of all appointments.
      Parameters:
      pageable - the pagination details.
      Returns:
      a paginated list of AppointmentDto objects.

    • searchAppointments

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<AppointmentDto> searchAppointments(String search, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Searches for appointments based on a search term with pagination support.
      Parameters:
      search - the search term used to filter appointments. It is case-insensitive and may match fields such as patient email, veterinarian email, or appointment number
      pageable - the pagination and sorting information
      Returns:
      a paginated list of appointments matching the search criteria, mapped to AppointmentDto objects

    • getAppointmentDtoById

      AppointmentDto getAppointmentDtoById(Long id)
      Retrieves an appointment by its ID and maps it to a DTO.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the appointment.
      Returns:
      the AppointmentDto containing the appointment details.

    • deleteAppointment

      void deleteAppointment(Long id)
      Deletes an appointment by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the appointment to delete.

    • getUserAppointments

      List<AppointmentDto> getUserAppointments(Long userId)
      Retrieves a list of appointments for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose appointments are being retrieved.
      Returns:
      a list of AppointmentDto objects.

    • cancelAppointment

      AppointmentDto cancelAppointment(Long appointmentId)
      Cancels an appointment with the specified ID. The appointment must be in the "WAITING_FOR_APPROVAL" status to be cancelled.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the ID of the appointment to cancel.
      Returns:
      the updated Appointment with a "CANCELLED" status.

    • approveAppointment

      AppointmentDto approveAppointment(Long appointmentId)
      Approves an appointment with the specified ID. The appointment must be in the "WAITING_FOR_APPROVAL" status to be approved.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the ID of the appointment to approve.
      Returns:
      the updated Appointment with an "APPROVED" status.

    • declineAppointment

      AppointmentDto declineAppointment(Long appointmentId)
      Declines an appointment with the specified ID. The appointment must be in the "WAITING_FOR_APPROVAL" status to be declined.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the ID of the appointment to decline.
      Returns:
      the updated Appointment with a "NOT_APPROVED" status.

    • countAppointments

      long countAppointments()
      Counts the total number of appointments in the system.
      Returns:
      the total count of appointments.

    • getAppointmentSummary

      List<Map<String,Object>> getAppointmentSummary()
      Retrieves a summary of appointments grouped by their status.
      Returns:
      a list of maps containing appointment status and their counts.

    • getAppointmentIds

      List<Long> getAppointmentIds()
      Retrieves a list of all appointment IDs.
      Returns:
      a list of appointment IDs.

    • setAppointmentStatus

      void setAppointmentStatus(Long appointmentId)
      Sets the appropriate status for an appointment based on the current date and time.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the ID of the appointment to update.
